title: The Temptations - For Lovers Only (1995) [EAC-FLAC]

The Temptations - For Lovers Only (1995)
                   EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC+CUE+LOG -> 394 Mb
                      Full Artwork @ 300 dpi (jpg) -> 24 Mb


Arguably the Temptations' best album since Truly For You dropped in 1984, For Lovers Only is not the Temptations' first album of standards. 

This set of classics is different than Temptations in a Mellow Mood, where they acquiesced to the material, giving relatively straight readings, and never deviated far from the songs' popular arrangements. 

The only things the standards on For Lovers Only have in common with the originals are the titles and the lyrics, the arrangements are completely different, and the tempos are changed. The Temptations' sing with this much enthusiasm in years.
